channel.title: HELP EVERY NPC HITs TOO HIGH
channel.description: Pretty Much every npc on this source i have hits super high! and lower levels cant event kill the goblins i had a server admin try and he almost died from the goblins help please? :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:[br][size=1]Posted on: June 07, 2007, 06:10:50 AM[/size][hr]HELP MEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEee

item.title: HELP EVERY NPC HITs TOO HIGH
item.dc:creator: @Final_Dawn Final Dawn
item.description:
@Final_Dawn wrote:

it seems you have the monster lvl to high in the npc.cfg just go in there and search for the monster you want to kill and then change the monsters lvl to the lvl it says in the game…and if that doesn’t work then idk…it works for me…so ya…and if you don’t want a person to kill a certain monster just put the monsters lvl to 999999 so it works!!! lol if that doesn’t work ill be back around 12:00 Central usa so ya…idk your time zone or time…im at school computers im doing a project for my mom and i don’t want her to see it right now so ya im at school so i can’t help you much here…ill help you more when i get home…

Read full topic
item.source: HELP EVERY NPC HITs TOO HIGH

item.title: HELP EVERY NPC HITs TOO HIGH
item.dc:creator: @MMcGrady2 MMcGrady2
item.description:
@MMcGrady2 wrote:

Don’t double post. Go to npc.cfg and find the monster(s). Edit the SECOND number to a lower ammount of HP.
